Song.title: Bless the Lord (10,000 Reasons)
Song.copyright: Jonas Myrin | Matt Redman Â© 2011 Thankyou Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing) sixsteps Music (Admin. by EMI Christian Music Publishing)

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Bless the L[G]ord O my s[D]oul [A/C#]O my s[Bm]oul W[G]orship His h[D]oly n[Asus A]ame Sing like n[G]ever bef[Bm]ore [G]O [ A]my [ BM]soul I'll w[G]orship Your h[A]oly n[G/D]ame [ D G/D D]
Verse 1: The s[G]un comes [D]up it's a n[A]ew day da[Bm]wning [G] It's time to s[D]ing Your s[A]ong ag[Bm]ain Whate[G]ver may p[D]ass and whate[A]ver lies bef[Bm]ore me [G] Let me be si[D]nging when the [Asus A]evening c[D]omes
Verse 2: You're r[G]ich in l[D]ove and You're sl[A]ow to a[Bm]nger Your n[G]ame is gr[D]eat and Your h[A]eart is k[Bm]ind For [G]all Your goo[D]dness I will k[A/C#]eep on si[Bm]nging [G] Ten thousand rea[D]sons for my h[Asus]eart [A]to f[D]ind
Instr (Alt.): [G D A/C# Bm G D Asus A G Bm G A Bm G A D]
{new_page} Verse 3: And [G]on that d[D]ay when my str[A/C#]ength is fa[Bm]iling The e[G]nd draws n[D]ear and my t[A]ime has c[Bm]ome S[G]till my s[D]oul will sing Your pr[A]aise une[Bm]nding [G] Ten thousand y[D]ears and then for[Asus]ev[A]erm[D]ore
Chorus: Bless the L[G]ord O my s[D]oul [A/C#]O my s[Bm]oul W[G]orship His h[D]oly n[Asus A]ame Sing like n[G]ever bef[Bm]ore [G]O [ A]my [ BM]soul I'll w[G]orship Your h[A]oly n[G/D]ame [ D G/D D]
ENDING: Wo[G]rship Your h[A]oly n[Bm]ame Lord I'll wo[G]rship Your h[A]oly n[G]ame [D A/C# Bm G D Asus A] Sing like n[G]ever bef[Bm]ore [G]O [ A]my s[Bm]oul I'll wo[G]rship Your h[A]oly n[Bm]ame Wo[G]rship Your h[A]oly n[Bm]ame Wo[G]rship Your h[A]oly n[D]ame
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus bless the lord o my soul o my soul worship his holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name verse 1 the sun comes up its a new day dawning its time to sing your song again whatever may pass and whatever lies before me let me be singing when the evening comes verse 2 youre rich in love and youre slow to anger your name is great and your heart is kind for all your goodness i will keep on singing ten thousand reasons for my heart to find instr alt verse 3 and on that day when my strength is failing the end draws near and my time has come still my soul will sing your praise unending ten thousand years and then forevermore chorus bless the lord o my soul o my soul worship his holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name ending worship your holy name lord ill worship your holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name worship your holy name worship your holy name

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Bless the L[G]ord O my s[D]oul [A/C#]O my s[Bm]oul W[G]orship His h[D]oly n[Asus A]ame Sing like n[G]ever bef[Bm]ore [G]O [ A]my [ BM]soul I'll w[G]orship Your h[A]oly n[G/D]ame [ D G/D D]
Verse 1: The s[G]un comes [D]up it's a n[A]ew day da[Bm]wning [G] It's time to s[D]ing Your s[A]ong ag[Bm]ain Whate[G]ver may p[D]ass and whate[A]ver lies bef[Bm]ore me [G] Let me be si[D]nging when the [Asus A]evening c[D]omes
Verse 2: You're r[G]ich in l[D]ove and You're sl[A]ow to a[Bm]nger Your n[G]ame is gr[D]eat and Your h[A]eart is k[Bm]ind For [G]all Your goo[D]dness I will k[A/C#]eep on si[Bm]nging [G] Ten thousand rea[D]sons for my h[Asus]eart [A]to f[D]ind
Instr (Alt.): [G D A/C# Bm G D Asus A G Bm G A Bm G A D]
{new_page} Verse 3: And [G]on that d[D]ay when my str[A/C#]ength is fa[Bm]iling The e[G]nd draws n[D]ear and my t[A]ime has c[Bm]ome S[G]till my s[D]oul will sing Your pr[A]aise une[Bm]nding [G] Ten thousand y[D]ears and then for[Asus]ev[A]erm[D]ore
Chorus: Bless the L[G]ord O my s[D]oul [A/C#]O my s[Bm]oul W[G]orship His h[D]oly n[Asus A]ame Sing like n[G]ever bef[Bm]ore [G]O [ A]my [ BM]soul I'll w[G]orship Your h[A]oly n[G/D]ame [ Bsus]
Chorus: Bless the L[A]ord O my s[E]oul [B/D#]O my s[C#m]oul W[A]orship His h[E]oly n[Bsus B]ame Sing like n[A]ever bef[C#m]ore [A]O [ B]my [ C#m]soul I'll w[A]orship Your h[B]oly n[A/E]ame
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus bless the lord o my soul o my soul worship his holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name verse 1 the sun comes up its a new day dawning its time to sing your song again whatever may pass and whatever lies before me let me be singing when the evening comes verse 2 youre rich in love and youre slow to anger your name is great and your heart is kind for all your goodness i will keep on singing ten thousand reasons for my heart to find instr alt verse 3 and on that day when my strength is failing the end draws near and my time has come still my soul will sing your praise unending ten thousand years and then forevermore chorus bless the lord o my soul o my soul worship his holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name chorus bless the lord o my soul o my soul worship his holy name sing like never before o my soul ill worship your holy name
